oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Centre Wales Factsheet 11: Benchmarking with Organic Centre Wales
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Anon,
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Indicators and other value-laden measures
Education, extension and communication
Farm economics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This factsheet explains what is meant by benchmarking, a method of assessing the performance of businesses, by comparing them against a ‘benchmark’ or industry standard. It also explains the advantages of getting involved.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Anon, (2006) Organic Centre Wales Factsheet 11: Benchmarking with Organic Centre Wales. Organic Centre Wales.
